attributes.action: To pull out of the UN pact on migration
attributes.additional_details:
Australia and the USA have left due to beliefs that this pact will remove political sovereignty of their nations.
https://refugeesmigrants.un.org/migration-compact
attributes.background:
We voted Brexit for a variety of reasons. On the major points was political sovereignty. This pact seeks to diminish the sovereignty of nations by not allowing them to control their borders in the manner they wish.
Also, this pact seeks to blur the lines between refugees and economic migrants.
